R

RandomGenerator - Class in tetris.piecegen
A piece generator that uses random numbers to generate pieces based on an initial seed value; it follows the Tetris convention of putting the seven pieces in random order, giving them all, then repeating as necessary.
RandomGenerator(long, Point) - Constructor for class tetris.piecegen.RandomGenerator
Constructs a new RandomGenerator with the specified random seed and the specified piece origin.
resetComponents() - Method in class tetris.gui.TetrisFrame
Clears and resets the board frame and all its components to the new specifications.

rotateClockwise() - Method in class tetris.Board
Rotate the current piece clockwise, if possible!

Rotation - Class in tetris.pieces
A set of 4 adjacent blocks that share the same color.

These are your blocks!
